vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2;
son of: Tola (H8439);
brother of: Uzzi (H5813H), Rephaiah (H7509I), Jeriel (H3400), Ibsam (H3005) and Shemuel (H8050I)
§ Jahmai = "whom Jehovah guards"
a man of Issachar and one of the heads of the family of Tola
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Tolá; tribu de Isacar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅買 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華保守的人"
以薩迦人, 陀拉的兒子 (代上 7:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅买 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华保守的人"
以萨迦人, 陀拉的儿子 (代上 7:2)
